src_original: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ /
āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ?
api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet - tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
